entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning late this morning then changing to periods of rain or wet snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with wet snow early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
